title: Did Steelseries Create The ULTIMATE Keyboard Switch?
description: During Computex 2019, Steelseries surprised us with an unveiling of their patented Omnipoint adjustable mechanical switches.  Basically these keyboard switches can have their actuation point modified though either software or the keyboard itself.  While this may not sound particularly interesting, the approach makes the Steelseries Apex Pro infinitely adjustable .  Its REALLY cool tech.    Learn more about the Omnipoint & the Apex 7 here:    Subscribe    This video is sponsored by Steelseries & Phanteks.
